name: Penguin Party
description:
Hey there! Penguin Party is a local multiplayer VS game where you shake platforms and try to knock your friends into the water!

supports controllers and keyboard, no bots (yet)

I made this game with @QueenSitra for my 30th birthday, I try to get myself something each year that I have been wanting and this year I really wanted to share something fun with all of you, so please enjoy my birthday gift to you all! :D

I started a new job this week and as such I ran out of development time, over the next few weeks we plan on adding

  1. Bots
  2. Web, Linux and Mac Versions
  3. Hats
  4. Maaaaaybe Online play
